Hi guys I got a question  how often do you need to service a vehicle in sg and is it optional or mandatory
Do you like your vehicle breaking down? If yes  servicing is optional
Service intervals always depend on engine oil brand and what the owner manual recommend
You just check your engine oil lo once in a while

Most new cars have a regimen of servicing (changing oil and filters) every 10k miles or 1 year  whichever comes earlier. If you drive hard then best to service more frequently like 5k km or 6mo
